channel.title: CVE Feed for Debian -- BIND9
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Debian -- BIND9

item.title: CVE-2018-5735|2024-09-16T17:58:19.116Z -- debian -- bind9
item.description: The Debian backport of the fix for CVE-2017-3137 leads to assertion failure in validator.c:1858; Affects Debian versions 9.9.5.dfsg-9+deb8u15; 9.9.5.dfsg-9+deb8u18; 9.10.3.dfsg.P4-12.3+deb9u5; 9.11.5.P4+dfsg-5.1 No ISC releases are affected. Other packages from other distributions who did similar backports for the fix for 2017-3137 may also be affected.
